>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/teams/{teamId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the details of the team identified by the given `teamId`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgId","in":"path","description":"Organization numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}},{"name":"teamId","in":"path","description":"Team numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Team update request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"avatarId":{"type":"string"}},"title":"UpdateTeamRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
